message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm offering it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $90 at this time.
I understand that $90 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $110.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $90. If you're not able to come down, I'm happy to move on.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I can offer it to you for $105, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
